about_the_game:
In this 2D, narrative-based game, you assume the role of the Grim Reaper... on an office job. Your job is to decide which people are going to live or die. The consequences of your choices are yours to bear, while the mystery of your incarnation awaits revelation!

In this demo, you will be able to experience the look and feel of the game (with everything subject to change, of course) in a short 15-minute break. If you wish, you can play through the demo multiple times to see how your choices may affect the outcome of each day.

Don't forget to wishlist if you enjoyed the demo!

We hope you have fun!
detailed_description:
In this 2D, narrative-based game, you assume the role of the Grim Reaper... on an office job. Your job is to decide which people are going to live or die. The consequences of your choices are yours to bear, while the mystery of your incarnation awaits revelation!

In this demo, you will be able to experience the look and feel of the game (with everything subject to change, of course) in a short 15-minute break. If you wish, you can play through the demo multiple times to see how your choices may affect the outcome of each day.

Don't forget to wishlist if you enjoyed the demo!

We hope you have fun!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with atleast 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+ or equivalent (64-bit)
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with atleast 512 MB of VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with atleast 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: i3 or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics or GPU with atleast 512 MB of VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: In this 2D, narrative-based game, you assume the role of the Grim Reaper... on an office job. Your job is to decide which people are going to live or die. The consequences of your choices are yours to bear, while the mystery of your incarnation awaits revelation! Coming February 2020.
